thread.section_title: Goldmoney.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldmoney.com | www.goldmoney.com
thread.title: GoldMatters

author: GoldMatters
title: GoldMatters
text:
What an amazing company! Wow! Buying gold at .05% over spot and storing it for free??
Not to mention utility of the gold you hold. Being able to transact in gold is a dream for a long time gold advocate like me. This is the holy grail of gold ownership.
Anyone reading this should ask their employer to open a Goldmoney Business account and ask their employer to offer them gold payroll.
If you have a business with a website, add a "Goldmoney Pay" button.
Goldmoney is awesome!
